describe.zh_CN: 携带咒术的水晶，制作魔导书必备的材料。\n咒术水晶可以通过魔力水晶再次注魔得到，需要在午夜时分，吸收咒文才可能注魔成功。\n注魔条件：午夜，周围有超过14个书架
describe.en_US: Crystals imbued with incantation, essential materials for crafting Spellbook. \Incantation Crystal can be recharged using Magic Crystal and need to absorb incantations at midnight for successful recharging.\nEnchanting Condition: Midnight, surrounded by more than 14 bookshelves.
